microsim.gui.space

Class LayeredSurfaceProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Dialog
            • javax.swing.JDialog
              • microsim.gui.space.LayeredSurfaceProperties
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class LayeredSurfaceProperties
extends javax.swing.JDialog
    Not of interest for users. It is the properties frame called by the LayeredSurfaceFrame when the uses presses the 'Properties' button.

    Title: JAS

    Description: Java Agent-based Simulation library
